sentences.cn: 措辞谨慎可使意义清楚.

sentences.en: Council members spent the day quibbling over the final wording of the resolution.
sentences.cn: 委员会成员一整天都在为决议的最终措词争论不休。

sentences.en: I don't think this is the time to cavil at the wording of the report.
sentences.cn: 我觉得现在还不是对报告的措辞较真的时候。

sentences.en: On the outer packing please mark the wording,'Handle with care '.
sentences.cn: 在外包装上请标明 “ 小心轻放”字样.

sentences.en: Posters force the wording of the message to be brief.
sentences.cn: 广告牌要求广告的语言简明扼要.

sentences.en: The final wording had not yet been determined.
The minister wrestled over the wording of the communique.
The two sides failed to agree on the wording of a final report.
sentences.cn: 双方未能就最终报告的措辞达成一致。

sentences.en: The wording is likely to lead to ambiguity.
sentences.cn: 这种措词可能会引出歧义.

sentences.en: The wording is so ambiguous that it leads to misinterpretations.
sentences.cn: 措辞晦涩,致使人误解本意.

sentences.en: The wording is so vague that no one actually knows what it means.
sentences.cn: 措辞十分模糊，谁也不知道究竟是什么意思。
这里的措辞故意模棱两可。

sentences.en: There was a lot of discussion about the wording of the report.
sentences.cn: 关于此则报道的措辞议论纷纷。

sentences.en: This is not merely a matter of wording.
We examine the wording in detail before deciding on the final text.
sentences.cn: 我们彻底仔细地检查了措词后才最终定稿。
